overview:
Clydesdale Bank PLC is one of the largest banks in Scotland.

Established in Glasgow, Scotland in 1838, the Cydesdale Bank has consistently expanded and is now one of Scotland’s largest banks, with over 150 retail branches across the country, including a network of Financial Solutions Centres.

In 1987, Clydesdale Bank PLC became a member of National Australia Bank Group, which has over 7.7 million banking customers and 2.3 million wealth management customers worldwide. Clydesdale Bank is one of three Scottish commercial banks with the rights to develop its own banknotes.

Clydesdale Bank provides a range of personal and business banking products and services, including:

• Internet Banking • Current Accounts • Credit Cards • Savings • Loans • Mortgages • Insurance • Travel • Financial Planning

Business banking includes options for a variety of turnover levels and business types.

Clydesdale bank also offer a private banking service.

The Clydesdale Bank are also sponsors of the Scottish Premier League - the leading football tournament in Scotland, as well as the Clydesdale Bank 40 Cricket competition.
